author: pamarcelot
msg: Updated 'Release Notes' section of the Apache DS Configuration plugin.

author: jacopoc
msg: When inventory is produced and accounted to the INVENTORY account an inventoryitemdetail record is also created to track the accountingQuantityDiff (needed by LIFO/FIFO costing methods).
This fixes the bug reported in the user mailing list by Chatree Srichart.
